about_the_game:
Get Sticked! is a couch co-op experience in which you and your friends will race to escape a deadly temple shrouded in darkness. Every surface can hide lethal traps which become visible on contact.


In a cycle of death, discovery, and revival, push deeper every time, clambering over each other’s limp bodies. Each player will play as a dapper gentleman, armed with ungentlemanly quips and canes, ready to dish out mockery in all forms (fully voiced)!

Get rewarded for your speed, agility and stick wielding mastery - score the most points and finish ahead of your rivals!

  • Local co-op for up to 8 players

  • Unique blend of casual and rage platforming

  • Hilarious player interactions

  • 100% voice-recorded SFX

  • Accessible for all ages and skill levels

  • Support for Steam Remote Play Together
detailed_description:
We're looking for feedback!

"Get Sticked!" is still in active development, so we'd love to hear your first impressions and any feedback you might have!

(Link to join the Discord can be found below or on the right, amongst other links and info)


How to play together

1. LOCALLY (the intended experience)
Connect as many controllers as there are players and go! 

2. REMOTE PLAY TOGETHER (results will depend on internet speed)
While the game is running, open the Steam overlay (Shift + Tab) and simply invite friends through the Remote Play Together tab - that's it! Only the host needs to have the game downloaded.

(Note: this system only permits one keyboard device, so all but one player will still need to use controllers.)


About the Game

Get Sticked! is a couch co-op experience in which you and your friends will race to escape a deadly temple shrouded in darkness. Every surface can hide lethal traps which become visible on contact.


In a cycle of death, discovery, and revival, push deeper every time, clambering over each other’s limp bodies. Each player will play as a dapper gentleman, armed with ungentlemanly quips and canes, ready to dish out mockery in all forms (fully voiced)!

Get rewarded for your speed, agility and stick wielding mastery - score the most points and finish ahead of your rivals!

  • Local co-op for up to 8 players

  • Hilarious player interactions

name: Get Sticked!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHZ+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB VRAM Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet is required for Steam Remote Play Together

short_description: Watch chivalry die in this couch co-op party platformer as you push each other through a trap-laden temple! Equipped with trusty canes, you must brave the darkness, forsake all friendship, and stick or Get Sticked!
supported_languages:
English*, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Lithuanian
*languages with full audio support
